title: Prehistoric fossil poses puzzles in shark research
description: A newly examined prehistoric shark from the age of dinosaurs provides surprising insights into the early evolution of modern sharks. It cannot be confidently assigned to any shark order that exists today and thus calls into question previous assumptions about the evolution of modern sharks.

title: Fidi Fossil To Flip Into 382 Apartments At 40 Exchange Place
description: GFP Real Estate plans a 382-unit conversion of 40 Exchange Place in FiDi, backed by $191.5M in construction financing and 467‐m tax incentives.
